mapper.insert: insert into spring_resource (id, code, title, menu_flag, vue_icon, vue_url, angular_icon, angular_url, parent_id, parent_name, sort_code, enable_edit, enable_delete, deleted_status, show_status, system_id, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{vueIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vueUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{angularIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{angularUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enableEdit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enableDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deletedStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{showStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update spring_resource set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_flag = #{menuFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, vue_icon = #{vueIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vue_url = #{vueUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, angular_icon = #{angularIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, angular_url = #{angularUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_name = #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_code = #{sortCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable_edit = #{enableEdit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, enable_delete = #{enableDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, deleted_status = #{deletedStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, show_status = #{showStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_user_id = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_ip = #{createdIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_user_id = #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_on = #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_ip = #{updatedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, code, title, menu_flag, vue_icon, vue_url, angular_icon, angular_url, parent_id, parent_name, sort_code, enable_edit, enable_delete, deleted_status, show_status, system_id, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip from spring_resource where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, code, title, menu_flag, vue_icon, vue_url, angular_icon, angular_url, parent_id, parent_name, sort_code, enable_edit, enable_delete, deleted_status, show_status, system_id, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip from spring_resource

select id, code, title, menu_flag, vue_icon, vue_url, angular_icon, angular_url, parent_id, parent_name, sort_code, enable_edit, enable_delete, deleted_status, show_status, system_id, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip from spring_resource where deleted_status=0
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, code, title, menu_flag, vue_icon, vue_url, angular_icon, angular_url, parent_id, parent_name, sort_code, enable_edit, enable_delete, deleted_status, show_status, system_id, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip from spring_resource where deleted_status=0
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT bue.* FROM spring_user bu LEFT JOIN spring_user_role bur ON bu.id = bur.user_id LEFT JOIN spring_role br ON bur.role_id = br.id LEFT JOIN spring_resource_role bp ON bp.role_id = br.id LEFT JOIN spring_resource bue ON bue.id = bp.module_id WHERE bue.deleted_status=0 and bue.menu_flag=1 and bur.user_id =#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by bue.sort_code asc

SELECT DISTINCT bm.vue_url,br.title FROM spring_role br LEFT JOIN spring_resource_role bp ON br.id = bp.role_id LEFT JOIN spring_resource bm ON bm.id = bp.module_id
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, code, title, menu_flag, vue_icon, vue_url, angular_icon, angular_url, parent_id, parent_name, sort_code, enable_edit, enable_delete, deleted_status, show_status, system_id, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip from spring_resource where deleted_status=0 and system_id=#{systemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
